html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-01032025-02-14TC, FIN
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectTrois-Rivières Port Authority ** LETTERS PATENT ** **AMENDMENT**
PrecisOrder approving the SUPPLEMENTARY LETTERS PATENT provision in order to increase the aggregate limit on the power of the TROIS-RIVIÈRES PORT AUTHORITY to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $42 million to $62 million.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the SUPPLEMENTARY LETTERS PATENT provision in order to increase the aggregate limit on the power of the TROIS-RIVIÈRES PORT AUTHORITY to borrow money on its credit for port purposes from $42 million to $62 million.
